question:
Which of the following spoke about the doctrine of wahdat al-wujud or the unity of being that had a profound influence on
Sufi thought worldwide?
explanation: In the later part of the twelfth and early thirteenth centuries, the great Andalusian Sufi, Ibn ai-Arabi,, spoke about the doctrine of wahdat al-wujud or the unity of being that had a profound influence on Sufi thought worldwide.
